title: 'Beautiful' Keeley Bunker, 20, found 'murdered' in woods to be laid to rest
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A funeral will be held today for a young woman found dead in a Staffordshire woodland a month ago.

Keeley Bunker, 20, was discovered lying dead in a stream near Tamworth hours after watching rapper Aitch perform at the O2 in Birmingham.

Wesley Streete, 19, from Tamworth, has been charged with her murder.

Family and friends will be paying their final respects to 'beautiful' Keeley in the town today, reports Stoke on Trent Live.

The service takes place just more than a month after her body was found.

(Image: @SnapperSK)

Missing person appeals were issued on social media after Keeley failed to return home from the concert in Birmingham.

Following the discovery of her body, family members paid tribute to her on social media.

Sam Phillips, a cousin, paid tribute on Facebook on Friday morning, writing: "Miss you always love you forever my baby cousin."

(Image: Adam Hughes / SWNS)

(Image: Tamworth Herald)

Aunt Jodie Majer added: "My beautiful niece who is more like my little sister!! I love you so much."

Keeley's friend Gabriel Summerfield described her as 'beautiful, smart and amazing'.

A tribute to Keeley on the official fundraising page for Keeley's funeral states: "Keeley our wonderful sister, daughter, best friend was taken from us Thursday 19th September 2019.

(Image: Tamworth Herald)

"Anyone that knows her knows her to be the one of the most vibrant, caring and beautiful souls this earth has ever seen.



"The donations on this page will be used to help with funeral expenses. Any shares and help given to the family is immensely appreciated."

A murder trial date has been set for March 16, 2020.
description: A 19-year-old man faces a murder charge after 20-year-old Keeley Bunker's body was found in a stream in Tamworth, Staffordshire
